Name: Jonathan Borwein
Notes: Canadian Rhodes Scholar and mathematician ; a professor at the University of Newcastle , Australia , since 2009 ; formerly a professor at Dalhousie University and Simon Fraser University , Canada

Name: S. Barry Cooper
Notes: Professor of Mathematical Logic at the University of Leeds

Name: David E. Evans
Notes: Professor of Mathematics at the University of Cardiff ; studied as an undergraduate at New College and moved to Jesus College in 1972

Name: John Griffiths ( F )
Notes: Fellow and Tutor in Mathematics , with a particular interest in analytical geometry

Name: Nigel Hitchin ( HF )
Notes: Mathematician working in the field of differential geometry and algebraic geometry ; Savilian Professor of Geometry at Oxford ( 1997-2016 )

Name: Hugh Jones
Notes: Professor of Mathematics at The College of William and Mary , Virginia ( 1717-1721 ) ; Lord Baltimore 's Mathematician

Name: Jim Mauldon
Notes: Studies interrupted by military service during the Second World War , during which he won the Military Cross ; a Fellow of Corpus Christi College , Oxford before becoming a professor at Amherst College in the United States

Name: H. W. Lloyd Tanner
Notes: Professor of Mathematics and Astronomy at the University College of South Wales and Monmouthshire ( 1883-1909 )

Name: Gareth Roberts
Notes: Professor of Statistics at the University of Warwick since 2007 ; has a particular research interest in Markov chains

Name: David Williams ( HF )
Notes: Fellow of the Royal Society and specialist in probability

Name: Sir Edward Wright ( HF )
Notes: Professor of Mathematics at Aberdeen University , having earlier been the first Junior Research Fellow at Christ Church
